data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perissinotto, Renzo (2019): Description of a new species of Rhinocoeta Burmeister, 1842 (Scarabaeidae, Cetoniinae) from the South African Northern Cape. ZooKeys 848: 41-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.848.34207, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.848.34207
